Key Match Events: Georgia won 2-0 against Portugal with goals from Kvaratskhelia (2') and Mikautadze (57' pen.)
Pre-Game Insights: Portugal are set to make a couple of alterations to their starting XI for the clash with Georgia on Wednesday evening at Euro 2024
Rafael Leao is unavailable due to his second caution of the tournament
Joao Felix or Pedro Neto could start on the left flank
Nelson Semedo could take Joao Cancelo's position at right-back
Cristiano Ronaldo is in line to make his 50th appearance at a major tournament for the Selecao
Post-Match Reflections: Portugal's predicted lineup: Costa; Semedo, A Silva, Dias, Cancelo; Neves, Palhinha, B Silva, Fernandes, Felix; Ronaldo
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at VELTINS-Arena
The match was held on June 26, 2024 at 8pm UK
